1.title: Healing Las Vegas and Transforming a Young Life
1.plot: Survivors of the Route 91 Harvest festival are reunited with the heroic strangers who saved them and their loved ones. A seven-year-old girl born without a right hand and forearm will receive a life-changing prosthetic device.

2.title: A Shared Heart and a Home of their Own
2.plot: A mother who donated her late son's heart will meet the recipient, also a mom, and be able to hear her son's heartbeat one more time. A family in need of a safe place to live will experience the surprise of a lifetime when they are gifted a house.

3.title: Finding Foregiveness and a Family Reunited
3.plot: A young man wishes to apologize to the mother of the girl he accidentally killed while he was driving and using a cell phone. The father of two young girls kidnapped by his ex-wife ten years ago is finally reunited with his daughters and regains custody.

4.title: Long Lost Mother and a True Miracle
4.plot: A 32-year-old man, forced to relearn all his motor skills after a cardiac event that left him clinically dead, will surprise all those who touched his life; a woman will reunite with her birth mother 37 years after she was placed for adoption.

-1.title: A Good Samaritan and an Incredible DNA Reveal
-1.plot: A professional baseball player shares big news, and a blind mother gets the chance to see her children for the very first time. What will happen when these life-changing moments happen LIVE?

imdb.plot outline: Unique stories of families and their loved ones as they experience an epic, pivotal moment. Every episode reveals compelling stories with the twists, turns and huge surprises that happen along the way. Watch these families go on a personal journey and share the joy, elation and surprise of once-in-a lifetime transformative moments.
imdb.title: This Is Life Live
plot: THIS IS LIFE LIVE goes inside the lives of families across the country to deliver life altering moments as they unfold in real time.

Unique stories of families and their loved ones as they experience an epic, pivotal moment. Every episode reveals compelling stories with the twists, turns and huge surprises that happen along the way. Watch these families go on a personal journey and share the joy, elation and surprise of once-in-a lifetime transformative moments.
